name: Export order in Hand
query:
SELECT 
  po.supplier_name AS 'Name Of the Party',
  po.name AS 'P.O.No',
  po.transaction_date AS 'P.O.Date',
  po.total AS 'P.O.Amount(FC)',
  po.terms AS 'Terms',
  po.conversion_rate AS 'Exchange Rate',
  po.currency AS 'Currency',
  po.base_net_total AS 'Amount Rs.'
FROM `tabPurchase Order` po
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` pi ON po.name = pi.custom_purchase_order
WHERE po.currency != 'INR' 
  AND pi.name IS NULL
  AND (
    (%(from_date)s IS NULL AND %(to_date)s IS NULL) 
    OR (po.transaction_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s)  
  )
  AND po.company = %(company)s
;
